skill_e.tooltip:
Ivern shields an ally, absorbing up to 80/115/150/185/220 (+?) damage. After 2 seconds, the shield bursts dealing 70/95/120/145/170 (+?) magic damage and slowing enemies by 40/45/50/55/60% for 2 seconds.

Can also be cast on Daisy.

skill_i.tooltip: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to receive gold and experience. After level 5 Ivern can share jungle buffs with allies.

skill_q.tooltip: Ivern conjures a vine dealing 80/125/170/215/260 (+?) magic damage and rooting the first enemy hit for 1.2/1.4/1.6/1.8/2 second(s). Allies can click on rooted enemies to dash into attack range.

skill_r.tooltip:
Ivern summons his sentinel friend Daisy for ? seconds. If Daisy attacks the same champion three times in a row, she will create a shockwave knocking enemies up for 1 second (3s cooldown). Daisy has:Health: ?Armor and Magic Resist: ?Attack Damage: ?
Recast to manually issue orders to Daisy.

skill_w.tooltip:
Passive: In brush, Ivern's attacks deal 30/37.5/45/52.5/60 (+?) bonus magic damage.

Active: Ivern grows a patch of brush for 30 seconds. For 3 seconds the area in and around the brush is revealed.
